蓧，读音是diào,tiáo,dí，是一个汉字，解释为除草用的竹编农具。
蓧, pronounced diào, tiáo, dí, is a Chinese character, interpreted as a bamboo-woven farm tool for weeding.

蓧字的基本解释

蓧
diào
古代一种竹编的耘田农具：“遇丈人以杖荷蓧。”

蓧
tiáo
羊蹄菜，一种草本植物，根可入药。
古同“条”。

蓧
dí
一种盛种子的竹编农具。

蓧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diào］
［《集韻》徒弔切，去嘯，定。］
亦作“莜1”。
古代耘田用的竹器。
[②]［tiáo］
［《廣韻》吐彫切，平蕭，透。］
(1)草名。即羊蹄菜。
(2)用同“條”。
[③]［dí］
［《廣韻》徒歷切，入錫，定。］
盛谷种器。

蓧字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓧； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1052第06
【集韻】同莜。【說文】草田器。【論語】遇丈人以杖荷蓧。【註】蓧，竹器。　又【廣韻】徒歷切，音荻。義同。　又【集韻】他凋切，音祧。苗也。【爾雅·釋草】蓧蓨。　俗作?。

蓧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蓧字的起名意思

暂无。

bamboo basket

An ancient bamboo-woven farm tool for cultivating fields: "When you meet Zhangren, you use a stick to hold a lotus."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diào］
["Jiyun" only hangs and cuts, goes to whistle, and sets. ]
Also known as "莜1".
Bamboo utensils used in ancient farmland.
[②]［tiáo］
["Guangyun" spit carving and cutting, smooth and transparent. ]
(1) Cursive name. That is, goat's hoof.
(2) Use the same "Article".
[③]［dí］
["Guangyun" cut through the calendar, enter the tin, and set. ]
Shenggu Seed Device.
bamboo basket
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蓧; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1052 Page 06
[Ji Yun] the same as you. [Said the text] Caotian implements. [The Analects of Confucius] When you meet your zhangren, use a stick and lotus. [Note] 蓧, bamboo ware.　[Guangyun] It’s a mere experience, and the sound is Di. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] He withered and cut, and the sound was awkward. Miao also. 【Erya·Shucao】Like.　Vulture?.
